column2: Kagro in the Morning is at the doctor at 9AM ET so he can continue to LIVE!
column5: Well it’s rerun time. Isn’t that exciting? Gotta go get the oil checked today and today at 9:00 was the only time I could do it without having to fast until late afternoon which would suck. So I’m taking Twitter pal Mighty OCD’s advice and running not last year’s show but a show from five years ago: June 30 2016. Why? No particular reason. The challenge was raised and I accepted. Might be interesting too! We were so young and innocent then. In the days before The Former Guy! If you close your eyes things might just seem… normal. Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
